title: Trade setup for Jan 30: Can NIFTY50 break the resistance and close above 25,500 on Friday? Check details
desc: The GIFT NIFTY futures indicate a muted start for Friday's trading session amid mixed global cues. The domestic cues remain strong as the economic survey of 2026 boosted the investor sentiment. The market is expected to remain volatile ahead of the crucial budget session on Sunday.
